definition: (Internet slang) (of the police) to ask to be let in on the pretext of checking the water meter/to barge into people's home on false pretences
to research/to check/to investigate/to examine/to refer to/to look up (e.g. a word in a dictionary)
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
exterior surface/family relationship via females/to show (one's opinion)/a model/a table (listing information)/a form/a meter (measuring sth)
aw, fuck! (loanword from Korean 아! 씨발!)
to open a door (lit. and fig.)/to open for business
Mr Wang from next door (term used jocularly to refer to a neighbor who is supposedly sleeping with one's wife)
to pick a lock/to force a lock
(Internet slang) (substitute for 我肏[wo3 cao4]) fuck/WTF
to break in/to force a door
